Although he tried to debunk the idea, Eric Schmidt may have been growing weary of all the attention and prosaic duties that come with running one of world's most scrutinised companies. I don't think Eric Schmidt was pushed. I think he jumped, said Ken Auletta , author of Googled: The End of the World As We Know It.`` I think Eric Schmidt is burned out.'' His senior defensive end/linebacker Jarrell McKinney signed with Western Michigan.`` He's my first Division I recruit,'' the Albert said of Jarrell McKinney . He has tremendous speed. He runs the 40 in 4.5. He's 6-5, 210, and when he goes to college they're going to put another 20-30 pounds on him. Playing defensive end, he's going to be outstanding. He's the role model for our other kids.... He's that bar that we have to set for ourselves.
